def SumDigits(num):
    r=0
    l = len(str(num))
    while l > 0 :
        r = (r)+(num%10)
        num = num / 10
        l-=1
    return r

cases = int(raw_input())
op = []
while (cases > 0):
    a = int(raw_input())
    #print(a%SumDigits(a))
    op.append(a%SumDigits(a))
    cases-=1
for x in op:
    print x
